abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage. Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

heroics.name: Go for the Throat
heroics.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroics.name: Cursed Bullet
heroics.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.
